block.p: CARGILL, Wayzata, Minn., the agricultural company, bought a 56 percent stake in Cerestar, a processor of grain-based starches and sweeteners based in France, from Montedison, a holding company controlled by Fiat, Turin, Italy, the automaker, for $419 million.

STANDARD PACIFIC, Irvine, Calif., a home builder in the West and Southwest, plans to buy the closely held Colony Homes, Orlando, Fla., which owns more than 2,300 lots in Florida, for about $29 million.
